price: او پر هغوى به هلته داسې جامونه څښل كيږي چې ګډون به يې سونډ وي.
arabic: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wayus'qawna fīhā kasan kāna mizājuhā zanjabīlan
translations: And they will be given to drink
